rows.label: qst202803_msg0001
rows.name:
Hello, Milolo-san. We were
introduced by Mogumogu...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202803_msg0004
rows.name:
I heard from Mogumogu, mo. That you're
looking for a new kind of ore.

rows.label: qst202803_msg0005
rows.name:
That's right! It's my dream
to find a new kind of ore.

rows.label: qst202803_msg0006
rows.name:
Normally, I don't appraise items
from the general public, but...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202803_msg0007
rows.name:
since it's a request from Mogumogu,
this is special, mo. If you find an
ore, you can bring it here, mo.

rows.label: qst202803_msg0008
rows.name:
I'll appraise it for free, and
if it's good, I'll buy it, mo.

rows.label: qst202803_msg0010
rows.name:
Really, it's rare to see a
Nopon who isn't stingy, mo.

rows.label: qst202803_msg0011
rows.name:
Are you really the one to
say that, Master Tora...?[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202803_msg0012
rows.name:
I'm not talking to you, mo. This
is special for Menou-san, mo!

rows.label: qst202803_msg0014
rows.name:
Then, I'll take you up on your offer
and have you appraise them all!

rows.label: qst202803_msg0015
rows.name:
First, I need to find some rare
ores from various rocky areas.
